name: Combat
summary: Combat is a video game by Atari, Inc. for the Atari 2600. It was released as one of the nine launch titles for the system in September 1977, and was included in the box with the system from its introduction until 1982. Combat was based on two earlier black-and-white coin-operated arcade games produced by Atari: Tank (published under the Kee Games name) in 1974 and Jet Fighter in 1975.
info:
• 开发: Atari
  • 发行: Atari
  • 平台: Atari 2600
  • 游戏类型: 多人STG
  • 游玩人数: 1~2人
  • 发行日期: 1977年9月11日
